articles.title: DPRK Soccer Team Advances into Finals
articles.content:
DPRK Soccer Team Advances into Finals
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK football team advanced into the finals of the 2008 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup held in Chile.
					 The DPRK team defeated its French rival 2-1 in the semi-finals on Dec. 4 to meet with its U.S. rival in the finals.

articles.title: Banks of Taedong River Lowered
articles.content:
Banks of Taedong River Lowered
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The banks of Taedong River flowing through Pyongyang have been lowered and consolidated between the Okryu Restaurant and the Chungsong Bridge.
					 The original banks which had been reinforced on various occasions after the liberation of the country played a big role in protecting the city from floods in the past.
					
					 This project has been done because several barrages were constructed across the river so as to control the water level and prevent floods including the West Sea Barrage in the mouth of the river and the Mirim, Ponghwa, Songchon and Sunchon Barrages in the upper reaches.
					
					 As a result one can view the Tower of Juche Idea, the east Pyongyang area and rich stream of the river from the west bank.
					
					 Roads have been constructed along the river and a large number of trees and the flowering plants of good species planted on the riverside areas.
					
					 The bank areas have been turned into parks for the citizens.

articles.title: Walled City of Pyongyang, Capital of Koguryo
articles.content:
Walled City of Pyongyang, Capital of Koguryo
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Walled City of Pyongyang, capital of Koguryo (277 B.C.-668 A.D.) is one of the national cultural legacies of Korea with a history spanning fifty centuries.
					 Koguryo moved its capital to Pyongyang in the year of 427 and built the walls in the latter half of the 6th century (552-586). Six wall stones inscribed with letters were found in modern ages, which proved the stage, period and scale of the wall construction.
					
					 The Walled City of Pyongyang with about 16 kilometers in circumference of the walls, 23 kilometers in total length of the walls and 11.85 square kilometers in total area has Moran Hill in the north and Taedong and Pothong Rivers in the east, west and south, which provided natural and geographical conditions unfavorable for the foreign invaders and favorable for defenders.
					
					It, which was called Jangan Walls, consisted of four castles -- Naesong (inner castle) where the royal palace was located, Jungsong (middle castle), the administration centre of Koguryo, where central government offices were located, Woesong (outer castle) where there were main residential quarters and Puksong around Moran Hill (outer ring walls for defending the city). According to a historical record, there were more than 210,500 households inside and outside of the walls.
					
					 The walls were 4-5 meters high in hilly lands and 7-9 meters high in flat areas. The Walled City Pyongyang was really an impregnable fortress with various defence facilities, many wall gates and commanding posts in the walls.
					
					 The Taedong Gate, Pothong Gate, Chilsong Gate, Ulmil Pavilion, Ryongwang Pavilion, Pubyok Pavilion, the sites of Naesong and Woesong and other relics of the Walled City of Pyongyang which are preserved as they were are valuable cultural legacies showing the might and development of Koguryo.

articles.title: Mighty Group Propelling National Fine Arts Development
articles.content:
Mighty Group Propelling National Fine Arts Development
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Korean Painting Creative Group of the Mansudae Art Studio of the DPRK is powerful center for the development of national fine arts. 
					The creative group has grown up to be a dignified and competent creative team since 1970s when the Korean painting "Evening Glow over Kangson" was created in the form of landscape on the theme of the socialist construction under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					Over last 30-odd years it has drawn the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and works depicting the great persons of Mt. Paektu and tens of thousands of fine arts pieces including thematic paintings of various forms and landscapes strong in national emotion. In the course of this, it effected a radical turn in the content and drawing techniques of the Korean painting, the main graphic form of national fine arts.
					
					It has improved ability and accumulated rich experience in the creation of large-size fine art works and displayed to the full the high standard of artistic calibre and collectivism.
					
					In the recent years it has created world-famous masterpieces such as the  large-size folding screen-form Korean painting "216 Peaks around Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu" and the Korean paintings "Mt. Chilbo in Autumn" and "Waves of Sea Kumgang" and large-size works of national treasure including landscape "Kuryong Falls in Mt. Kumgang" drawn on the wall of the screw staircase of the Mansudae Art Theatre and the picture "Ullim Falls in Autumn" on the wall of the central entrance hall of the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					The Korean paintings are winning popularity in other countries.
					
					The creative group has exhibited thousands of pieces of Korean paintings in more than 300 fine arts expositions held at home and abroad including several Beijing International Art Expositions, winning high appreciation.
					
					Under the guidance of the peerlessly great persons, the creative group is composed of many People's Artists, Merited Artists and able artists.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Theory of Confrontation Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Theory of Confrontation Blasted
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- "Co-existence and co-prosperity" touted by traitor Lee Myung Bak is a wicked theory of confrontation as it is aimed at selling off the interests of the nation to foreign forces and bedeviling the inter-Korean relations and, furthermore, launching a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The above-said theory is a theory calling for sycophancy towards the U.S. and subservience to foreign forces, to all intents and purposes, as it is designed to help the U.S. realize its sinister scenario to stifle the DPRK under the pretext of the nuclear issue. It is, at the same time, an anti-reunification and confrontational theory as it diametrically runs counter to the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving national reunification.
					
					 Of late the group of traitors is going reckless in its moves to dare do harm to the dignified system of the DPRK, foolishly letting loose such a spate of very provocative and war-like vituperations as "unification under the liberal and democratic system" under the pretext of "emergency situation". Indeed, it is a blatant challenge and an open declaration of a war against the DPRK which has made every sincere effort for peace and peaceful reunification of the country because it is an unpardonable treacherous act to stamp out the ideology and system in the DPRK and introduce the corrupt system of colonial rule in south Korea even to the DPRK in league with foreign forces. 
					
					 The group is keen to cover up this poor scenario of confrontation which betrays its criminal intention to do harm to the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces with the veil of the glossy watchwords of "co-existence and co-prosperity" in a bid to mislead the public opinion. This is an intolerable insult and provocation to the DPRK and mockery of the entire Korean nation desirous of the development of inter-Korean relations and reunification.
					
					 The above-said group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can justify its moves for confrontation with the DPRK and realize its criminal scenario with the above-said watchwords. 
					
					 The Korean nation will never pardon Lee Myung Bak for driving the inter-Korean relations to total severance and the situation to the brink of a war, persistently pursuing his criminal "policy towards the north" quite contrary to the trend of the times, but strictly settle accounts with him.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Fully to Blame for Deteriorated Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Fully to Blame for Deteriorated Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group asserted that "the north's measure is contrary to the inter-Korean agreement" and "it should be retracted immediately," complaining about the measure taken by the DPRK to strictly restrict and cut off all the overland passages through the Military Demarcation Line.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard: We cannot but distinguish between right and wrong as regards the above-said grumbling as such sheer lies were told without any blushing by the south Korean Ministry of Unification reported to specialize in handling the issues of the inter-Korean relations and spokesmen for Chongwadae which claims to be "a pivot of the regime." 
					
					 The DPRK hoped the new regime that emerged in south Korea in February also would implement the inter-Korean joint declarations. But Lee Myung Bak has rushed headlong into confrontation with fellow countrymen after adopting "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as his "policy toward the north" while sidestepping and negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it. It was none other than the Lee Myung Bak group that defiled "By our nation itself" as "chauvinist nationalism" and debased the June 15 era in which the nation is advancing along the road of reconciliation, cooperation and independent reunification as "the lost decade".
					
					 Whenever the group behaved so foolishly against the nation and reunification as negating the above-said declarations and opposing their implementation, the DPRK made advices and served warnings sufficient enough to convince it. But the group defied them. 
					
					 Needless to say, such moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen have compelled the north side to take such crucial measure as it had already informed the south side. 
					
					 The south Korean puppets have been hit hard at home and abroad for getting frantic with such confrontation, unaware of the DPRK's spirit that it does whatever, when determined to do. The above-said reckless remarks were made by them out of embarrassment. This, however, only brings to light their anti-reunification intention to push the inter-Korean relations to a more catastrophic phase. Every sin brings its punishment with it. The group would be well advised to drop its sinister plot to hide the blame for having brought the inter-Korean relations to a stalemate and mislead the public opinion, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday carries a signed article on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Improving and Strengthening the Party Information and Agitation as Required by the Developing Reality".
					 The work clearly indicates the way of steadily improving and strengthening the information and agitation as required by the times and the developing revolution to increase the militancy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolutionary ranks in every way and triumphantly advance the socialist cause of Juche.
					
					 The work has displayed great vitality in the practice of the Korean revolution over the past three decades as it clearly indicates the way of developing in depth the ideological work on a new high stage to suit the character and mission of the WPK which is advancing the socialist cause, regarding the Juche idea as its life and soul and a powerful weapon, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il has brought about a fundamental turn in the ideological work of the WPK. His wise leadership lies in that he has steadily developed the socialist ideas and theories in depth and made sure that the Party constantly improved the forms and methods of the ideological work as required by the times and the developing revolution and led all the officials to play their role as political activists powerfully motivating the masses.
					
					 The revolutionary spirit is prevailing throughout the society and ceaseless miracles and innovations are being performed in the drive to build a great prosperous powerful nation as there are the officials who are conducting the ideological work in a militant way as required by the Songun era true to the idea and intention of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Clumsy Effort Ridiculed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Clumsy Effort Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government on November 20 worked out a "bill on special measures for activities to combat piracy" aimed at dispatching escorts of the Maritime "Self-Defense Force" and, on this basis, decided to adopt it as a formal law at the regular Diet session next year. 
					 Minju Joson today observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Japan is getting so zealous in the international operations to combat piracy, prompted by its carefully calculated scenario. 
					
					 If Japan is allowed to get involved in the international operations to combat piracy, it will provide huge troops of the SDF with a legitimate justification to advance not only into the Indian Ocean but into the Atlantic and the possibility to conduct military actions as they please, firing artillery pieces together with multi-national forces, as they have long been legally hindered and bound to the domestic legislation.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that this will lead to the exercise of the "right to exercise collective self-defense" and full use of armed forces overseas which the Japanese reactionaries have desired for such a long time. 
					
					 That is why they are getting so busy with the above-said moves. 
					
					 Japan pretends to do something for the development of the international community, behaving itself attractively to everybody with a crafty smile on its face. But it cannot conceal its wicked intention to meet its own interests.
					
					 What the international community wants Japan to do is for it to opt for the settlement of its past crimes as demanded by international justice and human conscience, not unnecessarily poking its nose into other's affairs.
					
					 The claim of Japan that it can do something even without liquidating its past crimes only sounds hypocritical and deceptive to the international community. It had better bear this in mind.

articles.title: Abolition of NSL Demanded in South Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of NSL Demanded in South Korea
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement on Dec. 1 demanding the abolition of the "National Security Law" (NSL), an anti-reunification fascist law.
					 The statement said that the NSL is a treacherous, anti-reunification and undemocratic law as it is a copy of the "Law on the Maintenance of Public Order" enforced by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The suppression of people has become evermore pronounced due to the NSL since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak regime, it noted, and continued: 
					
					 Elementary democratic rights have been violated in south Korea under the repressive and tyrannical rule of the Lee regime and there prevails in Korea such a grave situation that the north-south relations have been driven to the phase of total severance and a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 We youth and students will actively turn out in the struggle for getting the NSL repealed as it blocks democracy in the land and national independence and peaceful reunification.
					
					 We will also launch a vigorous struggle for the resignation of the Lee regime which negates the June 15 joint declaration and the Oct. 4 declaration under the pretext of abiding by the NSL and seeks the permanent split of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Meeting and Photo Exhibition Held in Peru
articles.content:
Meeting and Photo Exhibition Held in Peru
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting and photo exhibition were held in Peru on November 27 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed in the venue of the event were photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The president of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for the Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy said that the Korean people have firmly defended socialism centered on the popular masses thanks to the Songun politics, adding that this instills great conviction and optimism into the Peruvian people.
					
					 The chairwoman of the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk noted that anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk's life was an immortal life of the great woman revolutionary who devoted her all to the leader of the revolution and to the country and the nation, stressing that her life is an example of human life to be followed by the Peruvian women.
					
					 The chairman of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and the secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea said that the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK is the most fair and aboveboard one for the working people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Commemorated in Mexico
 Pyongyang, December 5 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued its bulletin titled "Legendary Anti-Japanese General of Lifeguards" illustrated with a portrait of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero, on the occasion of the 91st anniversary of her birth.
					 She set a great example in devotedly defending President Kim Il Sung in the whole period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the bulletin noted, citing detailed facts about how she protected the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 Recalling that even in the period of building a new country after liberation she protected the personal safety of the President, the bulletin stressed that her life was the life during which she devoted her all to defending him. 
					
					 The spirit of devotedly defending the leader which she displayed in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people, the bulletin noted, emphasizing that she is immortal along with the Korean people.

articles.title: Futbolistas coreanas salen a final de Copa Mundial (F) Sub-20
articles.content:
Futbolistas coreanas salen a final de Copa Mundial (F) Sub-20
						
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La seleccion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se clasifico para la final de la Copa Mundial Femenina Sub-20 de 2008 de la FIFA, que tiene lugar en Chile, al salir vencedora por 2 a 1 de la semifinal frente al equipo frances que se entablo el dia 4, y hara competencia final con el equipo estadounidense.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica teoria de "convivencia y coprosperidad"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica teoria de "convivencia y coprosperidad"
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La "convivencia y coprosperidad", de que habla tanto la banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea, son la perversa teoria de confrontacion cuyo objetivo reside en vender los intereses nacionales a las fuerzas extranjeras, empeorar las relaciones intercoreanas y provocar la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea. 
					 Ademas, esta teoria caracterizada por el servilismo a EE.UU. y a otras fuerzas extranjeras y la oposicion a la reunificacion fue trazada en complicidad con el malsano designio de este imperio de aplastar a la RPDC bajo el pretexto del problema nuclear y negando completamente el espiritu fundamental de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, grandes programas para el desarrollo de las relaciones N-S y la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					 Revela asi el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado este viernes y prosigue:
					
					  Ultimamente, la horda del traidor Lee habla absurdamente de la supuesta "situacion bruscamente cambiada" de alguien y pronuncia palabras tan provocativas y belicosas como "la reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" actuando imprudente y atrevidamente para hacer dano al muy digno regimen de la RPDC. Todo esto deviene desafio frontal y declaracion de guerra a la parte Norte, que se esfuerza sinceramente por la paz y la reunificacion pacifica del pais, e intolerable locura antinacional encaminada a suprimir la idea y el regimen de la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y establecer hasta en ella el corrupto sistema surcoreano bajo la dominacion colonial de EE.UU. 
					
					 Pese a esta realidad, la banda de Lee trata de disimular esa evidente intencion criminal anti-RPDC y enganar a la opinion publica con las "agradables" palabras: "convivencia y coprosperidad". 
					
					 Esto resulta imperdonable insulto y provocacion a la RPDC y burla a toda la nacion coreana deseosa del desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion.
					
					 Estarian muy equivocados los compinches de Lee si piensan justificar sus acciones conflictivas con la RPDC y realizar su intento criminal con esa teoria.
					
					  La nacion no perdonara jamas y saldara estricta cuenta de los crimenes del traidor Lee que practica obstinadamente la criminal "politica sobre el Norte", que va en contra de la corriente de la epoca, y lleva las relaciones Norte-Sur al borde de ruptura total y guerra.

articles.title: Minju Joson censura modo de actuar de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Minju Joson censura modo de actuar de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El gobierno japones decidio aprobar en la sesion ordinaria de la dieta del proximo ano el "proyecto de ley de medidas especiales relativas a las actividades para la prevencion de pirateria", que fue elaborado el 20 de noviembre con el proposito de enviar los buques de escolta de las "Fuerzas Navales de Autodefensa". 
					Al respecto, el rotativo Minju Joson publico este viernes un comentario individual revelando la intencion egoista que hay detras de la activa posicion de Japon en cuanto al referido problema internacional. 
					
					Si Japon toma parte en la prevencion de pirateria internacional, sus "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", que durante mucho tiempo se vieron obligadas a quedarse en casa debido a las restricciones legales, tendran la justificacion legal para avanzar al Oceano Indico y al Atlantico y la posibilidad de desarrollar a sus anchas las operaciones militares usando fusiles y canones junto a las fuerzas multinacionales, precisa el comentarista y continua: 
					
					No cabe ninguna duda de que esto permitira a los reaccionarios japoneses el ejercicio del "derecho a la defensa colectiva" y el uso sin restricciones de sus fuerzas armadas en ultramar como ellos habian ansiado tanto durante largo tiempo.
					
					Si bien Japon actua con coqueteria como si tuviera la voluntad de hacer algun aporte al desarrollo de la sociedad internacional, no podra ocultar su malsana intencion de pescar en rio revuelto. 
					
					Lo que desea la sociedad internacional no es la no solicitada presencia de Japon sino la liquidacion del pasado criminal como demandan la justicia internacional y la conciencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Japon debe darse clara cuenta de que sus promesas de hacer algo sin liquidar su pasado criminal son y seran consideradas por la sociedad internacional como otra hipocresia y engano.

articles.title: Poderoso colectivo de creacion de bellas artes nacionales
articles.content:
Poderoso colectivo de creacion de bellas artes nacionales
Pyongyang, 5 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La Casa de Creacion Mansudae de Corea tiene el Grupo de Creacion de Pintura al Estilo Coreano, que sirve de una base poderosa para el desarrollo de bellas artes nacionales.
					  Hoy, este grupo llego a ser competente colectivo de creacion de bellas artes. En la decada de 1970 creo la pintura al estilo coreano "Kangson en crepusculo". Esta obra de tema de construccion socialista se creo en forma de paisaje bajo la atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Durante mas de 30 anos, este grupo describio la imagen de amplia sonrisa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y creo decenas de miles de pinturas tematicas y paisajes de diversos estilos nacionales, entre otras, las obras con imagenes de los Grande Hombres del monte Paektu (el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la heroina de lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk). 
					
					  En ese proceso trajo un viraje radical en el contenido y el arte de la pintura al estilo coreano, que es la forma pintoresca principal de bellas artes nacionales.
					
					  En el tiempo transcurrido, el grupo adquirio la sobresaliente capacidad creativa y acumulo abundantes experiencias en la descripcion de obras de grandes tamanos demostrando sin reserva la elevada calidad  artistica y el poderio del colectivismo.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, el grupo creo las obras maestras de talla mundial como la pintura coreana de biombo de gran tamano "216 picos del lago Chon del monte Paektu", las pinturas al estilo coreano "Monte Chilbo en otono" y "Olas del Kumgang Maritimo" y otras numerosas obras de gran tamano de patrimonio nacional "La cascada Kuryong del monte Kumgang" que es el paisaje de gran tamano en pared de escalera redonda del Teatro de Arte Mansudae y "El otono en la cascada Ulim" que es la pintura de gran tamano en la pared del vestibulo central del Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este.
					
					  Las pinturas al estilo coreano ganan gran popularidad interna y externa.
					
					  Miles de pinturas al estilo coreano creadas por este grupo fueron evaluadas altamente en las exposiciones de bellas artes nacionales e internacionales de mas de 300 ocasiones incluidas la Exposicion Internacional de Bellas Artes de Italia (1979), la "Exposicion Internacional de Bellas Artes Antibelicas" de Polonia (1985) y varias exposiciones internacionales de obras artisticas de Beijing, China.      
					
					El Grupo de Creacion de Pintura al Estilo Coreano recorrio una orgullosa trayectoria bajo la atencion de los Grandes Hombres sin par y crecio como poderoso colectivo integrado de artistas del Pueblo y benemeritos y pintores talentosos.
